/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with lush green trees and shrubs, providing a vibrant contrast to the clear blue sky. The buildings on either side of the street are adorned with billboards, adding a touch of urbanity to the otherwise natural landscape. The street itself is devoid of any vehicles or pedestrians, giving it a serene and peaceful ambiance. The image beautifully encapsulates the blend of nature and urban life in Beijing.
